summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding a draft press release for MCC correctional officers and the timing of an unsealed indictment to be obtained the following day.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, working in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, communicating about a press release and the timing of an indictment.

events.title: Indictment Obtained
events.description: The indictment is scheduled to be obtained at around 10 a.m. It will not be sealed, and a judge will be present.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated November 18, 2019, and discusses events scheduled for the following day.
An indictment related to MCC (Metropolitan Correctional Center) correctional officers is to be obtained on November 19, 2019, around 10 a.m.
The indictment will not be sealed, and a judge will be present at the time.
The communication originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
A draft press release regarding the MCC correctional officers is attached for review.
